page.syntax: Date_String as C = popup.calendar(C datename [,C title ])

argument.name: Date_String
argument.description: The date selected in the popup calendar.

page.discussion:
The POPUP.CALENDAR()displays a calendar that allows you to select and return a formatted date string. The style of the calendar display can be Xdialog or HTML, formatted with any of the available cascading style sheets. Note : If you have changed the Xdialog system font setting from its default value, you should use HTML style display. To enable HTML style display, select View > Settings > System > Preferences > Calendar Popup. Select Style and a cascading style sheet from the Value list.
If you use the Xdialog style, you should have your Xdialog system font setting at its default value (Tahoma 8 point). To restore the default font setting select View > Settings > System > System Fonts > Restore Default.
These settings also affect A5_GETDATEHTML() and UI_GET_DATE_CALENDAR().
